title: Who is Mojtaba Khamenei? Ayatollah’s son tipped to succeed Iran’s Supreme Leader
summary_full: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's reported death in US-Israeli strikes has created a leadership vacuum in Iran, with his son Mojtaba emerging as a potential successor. Mojtaba, an influential but opaque figure with strong ties to the IRGC, faces constitutional hurdles to the top post.
